description: Waving emotes with arms sort of on the side of their body. Kind of hard to explain but you can see how all of these look similar. It is like they are facing to the right and waving or scratching behind their ear. This is a great chance to use a dog emoticon.  (/・0・) (ノ^∇^) (ヾﾉ･ω･`) (ﾉﾟ∇ﾟ) ヾﾉ≧∀≦)o
title: Side Arms
